title: Which skins are impossible to get in Oceania server?
body:
I am searching for a list, but no luck so far, so I can use some ideas.
The 2 skins grey ww and medieval twitch are impossible to get because there is no friend referral there unless you transfer account from NA to OCE
I am also thinking of traditional karma and judgment kayle. Does OCE exist when these 2 skins were released?
And potentially a bunch of legacy skins perhaps? like spectacular sivir?
Holloween skins like prestigious leblanc and bewitching nidalee?

Anything else you guys can think of?

replies.body:
Traditional Karma was given to those who owned Karma before her rework, the same as Traditional Sejuani and Trundle. They have nothing to do with "being unavailable because OCE".
Judgement Kayle was a reward for playing ranked in Season One, again nothing to do with OCE being OCE.

Last I heard refer a friend is being replaced with a new system and the old rewards are not going to be available anymore.

Every server has access to the Legacy Skins when they come back around for sales, just like the Halloween skins.



Also next time you make a post like this, try to spell check before posting, it's bad enough that you sound like a moron to begin with, but then you add bad spelling on top.


EDIT: And just to say what I've already said.
Silver Kayle was for buying the physical edition of the game.
Black Alistar was for pre-ordering the digital collectors copy of the game.
King Rammus was for playing in the beta.
Silver kayle
Silver Kayle was for buying the physical edition of the game. I have it.

> [{quoted}](name=Klavinmour,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=WXqRqTQf,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2015-02-08T04:46:58.390+0000)
>
> Silver Kayle was for buying the physical edition of the game. I have it.

yes but it is now almost impossible to get

You mean it NOW IS impossible to get.
All the old codes were turned off, so any stockpile of Silver Kayle codes out there will never work again.

I have Silver Kayle.

> [{quoted}](name=Klavinmour,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=WXqRqTQf,comment-id=0004000000000000,timestamp=2015-02-08T16:32:02.629+0000)
>
> You mean it NOW IS impossible to get.
> All the old codes were turned off, so any stockpile of Silver Kayle codes out there will never work again.
> 
> I have Silver Kayle.

My friend has as well and yeah it is impossible now so unavailable in OCE unless you were one of the people who bought the physical edition

IT'S UNAVAILABLE EVERYWHERE!

Why say it's unavailable OCE when no one on any server can get it?
You're splitting hairs here. Mar3thyu isn't wrong and neither are you.

I Joined LoL in Feb 13, i have Unchained ali, Riot Girl Trist and Dreadknight Garen.
I think when i started, i was on the NA server as OCE hadnt been launched at that point, so i was able to get RGT/UA (w/e one that NA gets)

> [{quoted}](name=TerenceMckenna2g,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=WXqRqTQf,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-02-08T05:12:34.588+0000)
>
> I Joined LoL in Feb 13, i have Unchained ali, Riot Girl Trist and Dreadknight Garen.
> I think when i started, i was on the NA server as OCE hadnt been launched at that point, so i was able to get RGT/UA (w/e one that NA gets)

these are all free skins anyone can get
You can get those Halloween skins. But you can't get unchained Alistar
You can get Unchained Alistar, you just need to contact support in regards to it.
So much work for 1 skin and a 1350 ip champ :P
Black alistar

CS riven
:( missed by 2 days...
championship riven, no one can get it rn
You can get Traditional Karma, although its hard. It was the first mystery gift I ever got, and I main Karma and wanted it so bad
King Rammus?
King Rammus was for playing the game during the beta.
*cough* mystery gift *cough*
